channel.title: Data Context on Martin Koehler
channel.description: Recent content in Data Context on Martin Koehler

item.title: Our paper on data context informed data wrangling has been accepted at IEEE Big Data'17
item.description: The paper presents a methodology to fully automate an end-to-end data wrangling process incorporating data context, which associates portions of a target schema with potentially spurious extensional data of types that are commonly available. Data context, i.e. instance-based evidence, together with data profiling paves the way to inform automation in several steps within the wrangling process, specifically, matching, mapping validation, value format transformation, and data repair.
